TransactionState.DepositState: When users send Ether directly to the contract address
TransactionState.WithdrawalState: When users attempt to call GetHoneyFromJar or withdraw to retrieve funds

ExternalInteractions.OutgoingEther: Transfers Ether to the Owner and potentially the caller in GetHoneyFromJar
ExternalInteractions.CallFunctionality: Command function can execute external calls with arbitrary data
